FIELD.NAME: CONTENT-VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version Number for this message content description

FIELD.NAME: MSG-ID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unique ID used by the requestor or publisher to distinguish the message

FIELD.NAME: NDM-TYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Message contains an Attitude Ephemeris Message in CCSDS or other format

FIELD.NAME: NDM-SUBTYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Descriptor of the type / kind of the contents of the AEM. E.g. Quaternion values, spin data, and Euler elements

FIELD.NAME: STREAM-MODE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Identifies the mode of the stream of messages as either Real-time, Replay, Simulator, or Test

FIELD.NAME: FINAL-MESSAGE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: When true (and known, especially for replay data), indicates the last message in the stream.

FIELD.NAME: LENGTH
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Length of encapsulated Navigation Data Message in the DATA field

FIELD.NAME: CREATION-TIME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Time the Navigation Data Message was created.

FIELD.NAME: ACTIVITY-ID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the activity occurring within the mission

FIELD.NAME: ORIGINATOR
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Creating agency. E.g. GSFC-FDF, GSOC, JPL, JAXA etc.

FIELD.NAME: FORMAT
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Format of the DATA field (KVN: Keyword = Value Notation, XML: eXtensible Markup Language, RAW, or BIN (binary))
